none.comment: Should only be used for images, site headers, footers and article cards

xs.comment: Should only be used for the smallest components, like tooltips and info boxes

sm.comment: The default. A single line of text is the most typical usecase

md.comment: Should be used for components with several components stacked vertically

lg.comment: Should be used on larger components, like drawers

xl.comment: Should be used for buttons, tags and labels. Provides a complete rounding effect for single lines of text

2xl.comment: Should only be used for the app header
